summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to accept certain sums, as hereinafter specified, from the State of Washington, as full payment of the assessments levied against State Property in Local Improvement District No. 5423, 4th Avenue South, watermains, and other districts; and canceling any portion of either principal, interest or penalty that may remain a lien against said property after said sums have been applied toward the payment thereof.
